channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We-Vibe Discount Codes and Deals: Up to 60% Off
item.description: Save on We-Vibe, including app-controlled bestsellers and popular gift sets designed for couples, connection, and shared pleasure.

item.title: What you should know about the owners of US TikTok
item.description: ​ByteDance, TikTok’s Chinese parent company, recently established a separate American entity to run the app’s U.S. operations. This restructuring aims...

item.title: A North Atlantic Right Whale Baby Boom Is On—but the Species Remains at Risk
item.description: Researchers have documented the births of nearly two dozen North Atlantic right whale calves this season. It’s an encouraging sign for a species whose...

item.title: India’s Shadowfax slips on listing, as client concentration spooks investors
item.description: Shadowfax shares fell about 9% on theirdebut, valuing the logistics firm near its last private valuation.

item.title: Waabi raises $1B and expands into robotaxis with Uber
item.description: Waabi has secured a $750 million Series C round to accelerate autonomous trucking, and another roughly $250 million commitment from Uber to deploy 25,...

item.title: Google pitches Gemini to students studying for India’s most competitive college entrance exam
item.description: Google's launch of practice tests for JEE follows its recent move to offer full-length SAT practice tests in Gemini.

item.title: Lovehoney Discount Codes and Deals: Up to 70% Off
item.description: Save on Lovehoney, including bestselling toys, lingerie, and popular gift sets for date nights, self-care, and couples’ play.

item.title: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: 50% Off
item.description: Save on streaming with the latest Paramount+ promo codes and deals, including 50% off subscriptions, free trials, and more.

item.title: Apple Patches Old Versions of iOS to Keep iMessage and FaceTime Running
item.description: Apple is renewing certificates for iOS versions dating back to 2013 to keep the lights on a little longer.

item.title: Google Photos brings its prompt-based editing feature to India, Australia and Japan
item.description: Users can describe their edits in natural language to modify an image.
